Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.lex.interactionkit

Class InteractionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.lex.interactionkit.InteractionClient
  • public class InteractionClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The main service interface for the developers. This class abstracts all service complexities. Developers will primarily interact with this class. The parameters for interactions with a user are read from InteractionConfig. Set the these configurations before initializing this class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int SAMPLE_SIZE
      The size of the each sample in bit.

      • setAudioPlaybackListener

        public void setAudioPlaybackListener​(AudioPlaybackListener audioPlaybackListener)
        Assign a audio playback listener to this interaction client. This will be invoked during audio playback events only when audio playback is enabled.

        audioPlaybackListener -

      • setInteractionListener

        public void setInteractionListener​(InteractionListener interactionListener)
        Set an interaction listener for this client. If no internaction listner was provided, the default implementation is used.
        Parameters:
        interactionListener - the interaction listener InteractionListener.
